It was so easy in the first few chapters but the farther in we go, the harder it becomes. I will have to go in and edit some more but this seemed like a good time to podcast. What is happening? Isabella is still swirling around Munich and lands near Octoberfest where she finds an Amazon to live with and learns a hard lesson. Is she flexible enough to keep living this life?
